function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Limited information about covariables such as health services, epidemiological traits, and population movement hinders the assessment of the relative importance of air pollution among socio-environmental driving factors of covid-19 infections.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Air pollutants serving as airborne vectors for virus transmission","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Positive correlation between respiratory illness and chronic exposure to air pollutants","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of virus fragments in particulate matter","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Association between covid-19 and chronic exposure to air pollution","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High levels of air pollutants such as formaldehyde, carbon monoxide, and particulate matter pm 2.5 are associated with increased covid-19 infections and fatalities.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative correlation between aerosol data from satellites and covid-19 fatalities, but positive correlation with infections.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contrary to other pollutants, higher levels of o3 and so2 from satellite and ground data were not associated with more covid-19 deaths and mortality rates.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Correlation analysis between air pollution and covid-19 variables","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Geospatial mapping and visualization of covid-19 and air pollution","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High viral infections in areas with air pollutants","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited systematic covid-19 testing at a national scale in china, leading to exclusion of asymptomatic cases and potentially inflated mortality rates.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of satellite and ground station data to compute average air pollution measurements at the prefecture level in china.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Chronic exposure to air pollution linked to spread of sars-cov-2 in chinese cities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 as a highly contagious respiratory illness caused by a novel coronavirus","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk factors for fast spread of the virus, including age, gender, and smoking status","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental factors contributing to the emergence and spread of epidemics, including overpopulation, biodiversity loss, and climate change","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weak public health surveillance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of inter-institutional collaboration","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate economic and social impact management","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation spread about the disease","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological burnout and demoralization among health care workers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges of health and nutrition of low-income households","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive scientific studies on covid-19 impact on human development and well-being","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weak community-based crisis risk management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of inter-sectoral collaboration and government agreements for covid-19 control policies","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Trans-disciplinary health science research must be prioritized to develop a universal response to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Extensive research is needed to understand the covid-19 crisis life cycle and its causes and consequences","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Research studies are needed to explore the interconnection of climate change to the development of the virus and its potential environmental factors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of community participation in disease prevention and management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient focus on physical distancing and behavioral modification","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of integrated environmental and health management perspective","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of stakeholder engagement in combating covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to culturally adaptable and affordable technology","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate consultation of vulnerable populations in planning and response","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uneven distribution of vaccination","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Intellectual property rights and affordability","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inequitable distribution of disease load among vulnerable populations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of resources and expertise for covid-19 surveillance in low/middle-income countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate vaccination coverage and acceptance in local communities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fragmentation of health services leading to limited timely interventions and responses to health crises","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of highly active surveillance using who-recommended surveillance case definition","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of supported physical distancing interventions leading to high epidemic peaks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of post-crisis reconstruction and recovery","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spontaneous behavioral reactions and rumors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of safety nets for vulnerable populations","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of fake news and misinformation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequacies in global governance structure","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerable older persons facing challenges in accessing medical treatments and health care services for non-covid ailments and chronic diseases.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Isolation and limited mobility of older people living alone creating greater risks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
